hero.title: Transforming Elder Care with
hero.subtitle: A comprehensive platform that enables seniors to age safely at home while reducing costs by 99% compared to nursing homes - powered by breakthrough AI and IoT technology.

problem.title: The Elder Care Crisis
problem.subtitle: As our population ages, families face impossible choices between affordability, safety, and independence. The current system is broken.

delayedResponse.title: Delayed Emergency Response
delayedResponse.description: Falls and medical emergencies often go undetected for hours, leading to worse outcomes and higher healthcare costs.

escalatingCosts.title: Escalating Care Costs
escalatingCosts.description: Nursing home care averages $100,000+/year. Families struggle to afford quality care while seniors lose independence.

caregiverBurnout.title: Caregiver Burnout
caregiverBurnout.description: 47 million family caregivers face constant stress, unable to monitor loved ones remotely, leading to work disruption and health issues.

fragmentedInfo.title: Fragmented Information
fragmentedInfo.description: Healthcare providers, family members, and caregivers lack a unified view of the senior's health and activity patterns.

currentSolutions.title: Existing Solutions Fall Short
currentSolutions.subtitle: The market has tried to address these problems, but existing solutions are either too expensive, too limited, or compromise on independence and quality of life.

medicalAlerts.title: Medical Alert Systems
limitations: Require manual activation (seniors often can't press button during falls)
No predictive analytics or trend detection

homeHealthAides.title: Home Health Aides
limitations: Inconsistent care quality and high turnover
Limited to physical presence, no data insights

nursingHomes.title: Nursing Homes
limitations: Loss of independence and familiar environment

fitnessTrackers.title: Basic Fitness Trackers
limitations: No HIPAA compliance or data sharing controls

solution.title: A Better Way to Care
solution.subtitle: SymBIoT combines AI-powered analytics, IoT sensors, and intelligent automation to provide comprehensive, affordable monitoring that keeps seniors safe at home.

vitalMonitoring.title: Continuous Vital Monitoring
vitalMonitoring.description: 24/7 tracking of heart rate, blood pressure, oxygen levels, and temperature with AI-powered anomaly detection.
vitalMonitoring.improvement: Catches health issues hours or days before they become emergencies

activityRecognition.title: Intelligent Activity Recognition
activityRecognition.description: AI analyzes movement patterns, detects falls automatically, identifies behavioral changes that signal cognitive decline.
activityRecognition.improvement: No button pressing required - system detects problems automatically

tracking.title: Indoor + Outdoor Tracking
tracking.description: GPS tracking outdoors with custom floor plan mapping indoors. Geofencing alerts for wandering or unsafe zones.
tracking.improvement: Complete location awareness unlike GPS-only or indoor-only systems

smartAlerts.title: Smart Predictive Alerts
smartAlerts.description: AI learns normal patterns and alerts caregivers to deviations before they become critical. Reduces false alarms by 70%.
smartAlerts.improvement: Proactive intervention vs reactive emergency response

analytics.title: ILQ Analytics & Reporting
analytics.description: Independent Living Quotient scores track trends over time. Comprehensive reports for healthcare providers and family.
analytics.improvement: Data-driven care decisions vs gut feeling and anecdotal evidence

coordination.title: Unified Care Coordination
coordination.description: Role-based platform connecting seniors, family, caregivers, and doctors with secure data sharing and communication.
coordination.improvement: Everyone on the same page vs fragmented phone calls and texts

technology.title: How AI & IoT Make This Possible Now
technology.subtitle: Recent breakthroughs in artificial intelligence and Internet of Things technology enable comprehensive elder care monitoring at a price point that wasn't possible even 3 years ago.

ai.title: AI & Machine Learning
ai.description: Modern AI can now recognize patterns, predict health events, and reduce false alarms - technology that didn't exist 5 years ago at this price point and accuracy.

iot.title: Affordable IoT Sensors
iot.description: Medical-grade sensors are now 90% cheaper than in 2015. Wearables and home sensors can continuously monitor vitals at consumer-friendly prices.

5g.title: 5G & Edge Computing
5g.description: Real-time data processing with millisecond latency enables instant fall detection and emergency alerts impossible with older networks.

cloud.title: Cloud Infrastructure
cloud.description: HIPAA-compliant cloud platforms like Supabase enable secure, scalable data storage and real-time synchronization across devices at fraction of historical costs.

impact.title: Cost Savings & Better Living
impact.subtitle: SymBIoT delivers measurable financial benefits while dramatically improving quality of life for seniors and peace of mind for families.

lowerCost.title: 99% Lower Than Nursing Homes
lowerCost.description: SymBIoT subscription at $25/month vs $8,000+/month for nursing home care

reduceReadmissions.title: Reduce Hospital Readmissions
reduceReadmissions.description: Early detection prevents 40% of emergency room visits, saving $2,000-10,000 per incident

optimizeCaregiver.title: Optimize Caregiver Time
optimizeCaregiver.description: Professional caregivers visit only when needed vs scheduled visits, reducing costs by 50%

insurance.title: Insurance Premium Reductions
insurance.description: Proactive monitoring can qualify families for lower long-term care insurance premiums

ageInPlace.title: Age in Place Safely
ageInPlace.description: Seniors maintain independence in their own homes, proven to improve mental health and longevity

peaceOfMind.title: Peace of Mind for Families
peaceOfMind.description: Family caregivers sleep better knowing they'll be alerted immediately to any issues, reducing stress and burnout

fasterResponse.title: Faster Emergency Response
fasterResponse.description: Automatic fall detection and alerts reduce response time from hours to minutes, preventing complications

dignity.title: Preserved Dignity & Autonomy
dignity.description: Seniors live independently with invisible safety net vs constant supervision or institutional care

impact.savingsDescription: Average family saves by choosing SymBIoT ($25/month) over nursing home care ($8,000+/month) while maintaining better quality of life

market.title: Massive Market Opportunity
market.subtitle: Aging demographics and technology adoption create a perfect storm for disruption

ageAtHome.label: Want to Age at Home
ageAtHome.context: Current solutions too expensive or inadequate

whyNow.title: Why Now?
whyNow.subtitle: Multiple converging trends create an unprecedented opportunity for SymBIoT

techConvergence.title: Technology Convergence
techConvergence.description: AI, IoT, 5G, and cloud infrastructure have matured to the point where comprehensive remote monitoring is both technically feasible and economically viable for the mass market.

demographic.title: Demographic Crisis
demographic.description: Baby boomers entering elder care years while younger generations have fewer children and live farther apart - traditional family caregiving model is breaking down.

regulatory.title: Regulatory Momentum
regulatory.description: Medicare and insurance companies increasingly cover remote patient monitoring. Recent CMS reimbursement codes make our business model more attractive to healthcare providers.

covid.title: COVID-19 Acceleration
covid.description: Pandemic normalized telehealth and remote monitoring. Families now actively seek tech solutions to stay connected with elderly loved ones.

businessModel.title: Scalable SaaS Model
businessModel.subtitle: Multiple revenue streams with strong unit economics

cta.title: Join Us in Transforming Elder Care
cta.subtitle: SymBIoT is positioned at the intersection of massive demographic trends and breakthrough technology. Let's discuss how you can be part of this transformation.

geofenceAlert.description: GPS devices require at least one geofence to be set up before registration.
geofenceAlert.explanation: Geofences define safe zones and important places (like home, work, or medical facilities). They enable location-based alerts when the person enters or exits these areas.
geofenceAlert.step1: Go to Tracking in the navigation
geofenceAlert.step3: Use the Geofence Manager to add places
geofenceAlert.step4: Return here to register your GPS device

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.heroSubtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your family care needs

switchPlans.question: Can I switch plans later?
switchPlans.answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be reflected in your next billing cycle.

trialEnds.question: What happens after my free trial ends?
trialEnds.answer: After your 14-day trial, you can choose to continue with a paid plan. If you don't select a plan, your account will be paused until you choose one.

yearlyBilling.question: How does yearly billing work?
yearlyBilling.answer: With yearly billing, you pay for 12 months upfront and save 5% compared to monthly billing. The full amount is charged once per year.

whatIsDevice.question: What counts as a device?
whatIsDevice.answer: A device is any wearable or sensor connected to the SymBIoT platform for monitoring. This includes smartwatches, fitness trackers, and dedicated health monitors.

freeTrial.name: Free Trial
freeTrial.description: Perfect for trying out our service

premium.name: Premium
premium.description: Best for larger families and care facilities

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.message: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.

help.description: Find answers and learn how to use SymBIoT effectively

viewDashboard.title: View Dashboard
viewDashboard.description: See overview of all monitored persons

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started with SymBIoT
gettingStarted.content: SymBIoT is a comprehensive monitoring platform for elderly care. Start by viewing the Dashboard for an overview, then explore Activity tracking, Alerts management, and Device monitoring.

navigation.title: Navigating the Platform
navigation.content: Use the navigation menu to access different sections: Dashboard (overview), Activity (movement patterns), Tracking (location), Alerts (notifications), and Devices (device status).

dashboardOverview.title: Understanding the Dashboard
dashboardOverview.content: The Dashboard shows key metrics at a glance: monitored persons, active alerts, average heart rate, and activity level. Select a person from the list to view their specific vital metrics.

selectingPerson.title: Selecting a Person to Monitor
selectingPerson.content: Click on any person in the "Monitored Persons" list to view their specific data. Their vital metrics, medications, and environmental sensors will update automatically.

vitalMetrics.title: Viewing Vital Metrics
vitalMetrics.content: Vital metrics show real-time health data including heart rate, blood pressure, oxygen levels, temperature, and more. Click "View Charts" to see historical trends.

activityDashboard.title: Activity Dashboard Overview
activityDashboard.content: Track movement patterns, dwell times, and activity deviations. Use the date range selector to analyze different time periods. View summary stats, dwell time analysis, and create ideal profiles.

dwellTime.title: Understanding Dwell Time
dwellTime.content: Dwell time is the amount of time spent in each location. Green bars indicate normal range, yellow shows 10-20% deviation, and red indicates significant deviation (>20%) or outside acceptable range.

idealProfiles.title: Creating Ideal Profiles
idealProfiles.content: Ideal profiles establish baseline activity patterns. Click "New Profile", use "Use Current as Baseline" to capture typical activity, adjust min/max thresholds, then activate. The system will alert you when patterns deviate significantly.

alertManagement.title: Managing Alerts
alertManagement.content: View all system alerts with filtering by severity, type, status, and date range. Use search to find specific alerts. Click "Acknowledge" to mark alerts as reviewed.

alertSeverity.title: Alert Severity Levels
alertSeverity.content: Critical (red): Immediate action required (panic button, severe vital anomaly). High (orange): Urgent attention needed. Medium (yellow): Should be reviewed soon. Low (gray): Informational.

alertTypes.title: Types of Alerts
alertTypes.content: Vital Signs: Health metric anomalies. Panic/SOS: Emergency button activation. Device Offline: Device connection lost. Geofence: Location boundary violation. Inactivity: Prolonged inactivity detected. Dwell Time: Unusual time spent in locations.

acknowledgingAlerts.title: Acknowledging Alerts
acknowledgingAlerts.content: Click the "Acknowledge" button on active alerts to mark them as reviewed. This tracks response times and shows accountability. Acknowledged alerts move to acknowledged status.

deviceMonitoring.title: Monitoring Devices
deviceMonitoring.content: View all connected devices for each person. Online (green): Connected and transmitting. Offline (yellow): No recent data. Check battery levels and last data received timestamps.

deviceTypes.title: Understanding Device Types
deviceTypes.content: Common device types include: Wearables (fitness trackers, smartwatches), Health Monitors (blood pressure, glucose meters), Environmental Sensors (temperature, motion detectors), GPS Trackers, and Panic Buttons.

indoorTracking.title: Indoor Tracking with Floor Plans
indoorTracking.content: View real-time location on uploaded floor plans. Create zones to define areas like bedroom, kitchen, bathroom. Track movement paths and dwell times in each zone.

outdoorTracking.title: Outdoor GPS Tracking
outdoorTracking.content: Monitor outdoor location with GPS tracking. Set up geofences to receive alerts when the person enters or exits designated areas. View location history on the map.

geofences.title: Setting Up Geofences
geofences.content: Geofences are virtual boundaries. Click "Add Geofence" on the map, draw the boundary, set a name and radius. Choose alert triggers (entry, exit, or both). Receive notifications when boundaries are crossed.

sharingData.title: Sharing Data with Family
sharingData.content: Share monitoring data with family members or other caregivers. Use the Data Sharing page to manage who has access to which person's data. Set permissions and expiration dates.

deviceOffline.title: Device Showing Offline
deviceOffline.content: If a device shows offline: 1) Check if the device is powered on. 2) Ensure it's within range of the network. 3) Check battery level. 4) Try restarting the device. 5) Contact support if issue persists.

noData.title: Missing Data or No Data Shown
noData.content: If you see no data: 1) Verify the correct person is selected. 2) Check the date range. 3) Ensure devices are connected and transmitting. 4) Refresh the page. 5) Verify you have access permissions.

alertsNotShowing.title: Alerts Not Appearing
alertsNotShowing.content: If expected alerts aren't showing: 1) Check alert filters (severity, type, status, date range). 2) Clear search terms. 3) Verify alert settings are configured. 4) Check if alerts were already acknowledged.

hero.title: Peace of Mind for Your Loved Ones
hero.subtitle: Advanced IoT health monitoring that keeps families connected and elderly loved ones safe, independent, and thriving at home.

features.title: Comprehensive Care, Simplified
features.subtitle: Monitor health, activity, and environment with AI-powered insights that alert you to what matters most.

realTimeVitals.title: Real-Time Vitals
realTimeVitals.description: Monitor heart rate, blood pressure, oxygen levels, and more with wearable and non-invasive sensors.

activityTracking.title: Activity Tracking
activityTracking.description: Automatic detection of daily routines, movement patterns, and activity levels to spot changes early.

smartAlerts.title: Smart Alerts
smartAlerts.description: Intelligent notifications for falls, missed medications, irregular vitals, or unusual behavior patterns.

privacyFirst.title: Privacy First
privacyFirst.description: HIPAA and GDPR compliant with encrypted data storage and role-based access control for family members.

predictiveAnalytics.title: Predictive Analytics
predictiveAnalytics.description: AI-powered insights that predict potential health issues before they become emergencies.

familyCollaboration.title: Family Collaboration
familyCollaboration.description: Coordinate care with family members, caregivers, and healthcare providers on one secure platform.

cta.title: Ready to Bring Peace of Mind Home?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of families who trust SymBIoT to keep their loved ones safe and independent.
